choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.g_no as gNo, a.o_no as oNo, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc

mapper.delete: delete from board where g_no=#{gNo} and o_no=#{oNo} and user_no=#{userNo}
